title: 44.1 (LOA)
content:
As you walk around the wide base of Lone Tree Station, you come across Kordo Haverson sitting at a table set outside the entrance to the Old Ranger’s Root. The old Ranger has his sphere cam longbow disassembled on the flat planks and seems to be tinkering with it intently.

Clear Kordo with   to ask what his plans are for that bow.
